verse: I said to the Lord, “None of us can understand why the land has become like an uncrossable desert. Won’t you explain why?”

header: The Women Who Are Paid To Weep

verse: Someday I will punish the nations of Egypt, Edom, Ammon, and Moab, and the tribes of the desert. The men of these nations are circumcised, but they don’t worship me. And it’s the same with you people of Judah. Your bodies are circumcised, but your hearts are unchanged.
